verses.verse: <S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you sons of the <S%H1121>mighty,<s%> <S%H3051>ascribe<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
<S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> due to his <S%H8034>name.<s%> <S%H7812>Worship<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1927>array.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice<s%> is on the <S%H4325>waters.<s%> The <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%> <S%H7481>thunders,<s%> even <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> on <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7665>breaks<s%> the <S%H730>cedars.<s%> <S%H3068>Yes,<s%> Yahweh <S%H7665>breaks<s%> in pieces the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
He makes them also to <S%H7540>skip<s%> like a <S%H5695>calf;<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> and <S%H8303>Sirion<s%> like a <S%H1121>young,<s%> wild <S%H7214>ox.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice<s%> makes the <S%H355>deer<s%> <S%H2342>calve,<s%> and <S%H2834>strips<s%> the <S%H3295>forests<s%> <S%H1964>bare.<s%> In his temple everything <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H3519>"Glory!<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> to his <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
